mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fs_order(id, phoneNo, productCode, orderTime, batchId, customerId, province, channel, status, message, operator, orderFrom, callbackUrl, orderPrice, sellPrice, prodId, productSize, customerDiscount, prodName) VALUES(#{id}, #{phoneNo}, #{productCode}, #{orderTime}, #{batchId}, #{customerId}, #{province}, #{channel}, #{status}, #{message}, #{operator}, #{orderFrom}, #{callbackUrl}, #{orderPrice}, #{sellPrice}, #{prodId}, #{productSize}, #{customerDiscount}, #{prodName})
